titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation containing his Majesties gracious indemnity
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at White-hall, the twenty-fifth day of September, 1684/5, and of Our Reign the first year.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
